alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 1:09PM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with only an inch or so in western Sweetwater County, and 4 to 6 inches from Jeffrey City to Waltman. Casper Mountain is expected to receive 6 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, Natrona County Lower Elevations, Casper Mountain, Rock Springs and Green River, and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From 3 AM Wednesday to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall Wednesday morning, then again from 3 PM Wednesday through 9 PM Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Rock Springs and Green River
